Hi, this is my code on vb.net

Dim map As New GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapControl
    map.Position = New PointLatLng(14.621333, -90.525391)
    map.Dock = DockStyle.Fill
    GMap.NET.MapProviders.GoogleSatelliteMapProvider.Instance.APIKey = "AIzaSyAWdNLn_ldEL5FFpo5suXTwZipbPKMkAdc"
    map.MapProvider = MapProviders.GoogleMapProvider.Instance
    map.MinZoom = 3
    map.MaxZoom = 17
    map.Zoom = 6
    map.CanDragMap = True
    map.DragButton = MouseButtons.Left
    map.Manager.Mode = AccessMode.ServerOnly
    Me.Controls.Add(map)
I just got a white screen on the handheld. Any idea ? I'm using vs 2008 framework 3.5 window mobile 6.
make sure that you have the internet connection on your device
